item.title: [cmr] Ramos, Dragon Engine
item.description:
Legendary Artifact Creature — Dragon

Flying

Whenever you cast a spell, put a +1/+1 counter on Ramos, Dragon Engine for each of that spell's colors.

Remove five +1/+1 counters from Ramos: Add {W}{W}{U}{U}{B}{B}{R}{R}{G}{G}. Activate this ability only once each turn.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EMh4d4ytTEk

item.title: [cmr] Ancestral Blade
item.description:
Artifact — Equipment

When Ancestral Blade enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 white Soldier creature token, then attach Ancestral Blade to it.

Equipped creature gets +1/+1.

Equip {1} ({1}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

item.title: [cmr] Doomed Traveler
item.description:
Creature — Human Soldier

When Doomed Traveler dies, create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.

item.title: [cmr] Captain's Call
item.description:
Sorcery

Create three 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens.

item.title: [cmr] Cage of Hands
item.description:
Enchantment — Aura

Enchant creature

Enchanted creature can't attack or block.

{1}{W}: Return Cage of Hands to its owner's hand.

item.title: [cmr] First Response
item.description:
Enchantment

At the beginning of each upkeep, if you lost life last turn, create a 1/1 white Soldier creature token.

item.title: [cmr] Gift of Paradise
item.description:
Enchantment — Aura

Enchant land

When Gift of Paradise enters the battlefield, you gain 3 life.

Enchanted land has "{T}: Add two mana of any one color."

item.title: [cmr] Horizon Stone
item.description:
Artifact

If you would lose unspent mana, that mana becomes colorless instead.

item.title: [cmr] Prava of the Steel Legion
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Cat Soldier

As long as it's your turn, creature tokens you control get +1/+4.

{3}{W}: Create a 1/1 white Soldier creature token.

Partner (You can have two commanders if both have partner.)

https://youtu.be/yiW1gzzlg38

item.title: [cmr] Slash the Ranks
item.description:
Sorcery

Destroy all creatures and planeswalkers except for commanders.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Yc_clSPaPyA

item.title: [cmr] Ghost of Ramirez DePietro
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Pirate Spirit

Ghost of Ramirez DePietro can't be blocked by creatures with toughness 3 or greater.

Whenever Ghost of Ramirez DePietro deals combat damage to a player, choose up to one target card in a graveyard that was discarded or put there from a library this turn. Put that card into its owner's hand.

Partner (You can have two commanders if both have partner.)

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EbsqHi0FmB0

item.title: [cmr] Laboratory Drudge
item.description:
Creature — Zombie Horror

At the beginning of each end step, draw a card if you've cast a spell from a graveyard or activated an ability of a card in a graveyard this turn.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4pszQeupFUc

item.title: [cmr] Preordain
item.description:
Sorcery

Scry 2, then draw a card. (To scry 2, look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

https://www.facebook.com/267919946712672/posts/1615100658661254

item.title: [cmr] Keskit, the Flesh Sculptor
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Human Artificer

{T}, Sacrifice three other artifacts and/or creatures: Look at the top three cards of your library. Put two of them into your hand and the other into your graveyard.

Partner (You can have two commanders if both have partner.)

item.title: [cmr] Profane Transfusion
item.description:
Sorcery

Two target players exchange life totals. You create an X/X colorless Horror artifact creature token, where X is the difference between those players' life totals.

https://www.kotaku.com.au/2020/10/mtg-commander-legends-exclusive-look/

item.title: [cmr] Krark, the Thumbless
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Goblin Wizard

Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, flip a coin. If you lose the flip, return that spell to its owner's hand. If you win the flip, copy that spell, and you may choose new targets for the copy.

Partner (You can have two commanders if both have partner.)

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7nh4QgPuZ5Q

item.title: [cmr] Emberwilde Captain
item.description:
Creature — Djinn Pirate

When Emberwilde Captain enters the battlefield, you become the monarch.

Whenever an opponent attacks you while you're the monarch, Emberwilde Captain deals damage to that player equal to the number of cards in their hand.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=E5iXlkN0IkM

item.title: [cmr] Aurora Phoenix
item.description:
Creature — Phoenix

Flying

Cascade (When you cast this spell, exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card that costs less. You may cast it without paying its mana cost. Put the exiled cards on the bottom of your library in a random order.)

Whenever you cast a spell with cascade, return Aurora Phoenix from your graveyard to your hand.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=E5iXlkN0IkM

item.title: [cmr] Numa, Joraga Chieftain
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Elf Warrior

At the beginning of combat on your turn, you may pay {X}{X}. When you do, distribute X +1/+1 counters among any number of target Elves.

Partner (You can have two commanders if both have partner.)

Cascade

Reach

item.description:
Legendary Creature — Faerie Knight

Flash

Flying

item.title: [cmr] Colfenor, the Last Yew
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Treefolk Shaman

Vigilance, reach

Whenever Colfenor, the Last Yew or another creature you control dies, return up to one other target creature card with lesser toughness from your graveyard to your hand.

item.title: [cmr] Belbe, Corrupted Observer
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Zombie Elf

At the beginning of each player's postcombat main phase, that player adds {C}{C} for each of your opponents who lost life this turn. (Damage causes loss of life.)

item.title: [cmr] Yurlok of Scorch Thrash
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Viashino Shaman

Vigilance

A player losing unspent mana causes that player to lose that much life.

{1}, {T}: Each player adds {B}{R}{G}.

Land

item.title: [cmr] Kinsbaile Courier
item.description:
Creature — Kithkin Soldier

When Kinsbaile Courier enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.

Encore {2}{W} ({2}{W}, Exile this card from your graveyard: For each opponent, create a token copy that attacks that opponent this turn if able. They gain haste. Sacrifice them at the beginning of the next end step. Activate only as a sorcery.)

item.title: [cmr] Archelos, Lagoon Mystic
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Turtle Shaman

As long as Archelos, Lagoon Mystic is tapped, other permanents enter the battlefield tapped.

As long as Archelos, Lagoon Mystic is untapped, other permanents enter the battlefield untapped.
